review: gotta love these sorts of games, you get your choice of 4 races, 2 are locked btw, and you get your choice of 9 classes, but if you want to play the first 3 or last 3, your female, but if you want the middle 3, then your male. also their idea of a non-target system is that the system will auto lock onto anything near your cursor, so its not actually a non-target system. oh, and before i forget, its just funny to watch everyone attempting to jump over the fence, but the devs messed up the jump system, so all you see is 4-12 people all stuck on the fence in the jump animation.
